NexoVPN - Fast & Secure Turkish Proxy

A lightweight VPN extension that provides secure and reliable proxy service through Turkish servers. Designed for users who need specific access to Turkish network resources, this extension offers:

• One-click connection to Turkish proxy servers
• Simple and intuitive interface
• Bypass local network option
• Custom domain blacklist
• Automatic connection verification

Note: Currently only supports Turkish proxy servers.

Enjoy secure and efficient browsing through our Turkish proxy network!
